h1_title: The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm
content: The rest of the path leads right back along a ridge that overlooks the forest you ventured through earlier (as well as some Celestial Pears you can harvest), and eventually over to the side of the Warding Temple that you can drop down to reach the Shrine.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Pagoda_Realm_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm', specifically from the subsection 'Snow-Veiled Trail'.
The content is as follows:
The rest of the path leads right back along a ridge that overlooks the forest you ventured through earlier (as well as some Celestial Pears you can harvest), and eventually over to the side of the Warding Temple that you can drop down to reach the Shrine.
